Mi primera reseña era con 60, ahora llevo como 170h (digo esto jugando el Parche 2.2.0 en el que han Nerfeado a los Supervivientes) y la cosa no mejora en absoluto a lo ya dicho hay que añadir ALGO IMPORTANTE y el PAY TO WIN.

-PAY TO WIN? Paga por la cuenta que te trae, como mínimo. Si juegas como Killer ten clarísimo que sin Ruina y Barbacoa no vas a poder jugar en condiciones y más si eres nuevo. Son Habilidades de Personajes de DLCs de pago que no vienen con el juego, asi que añade al precio del juego de 8-10€ y algo muy parecido con las Perks Decentes de Superviviente, así que mucho ojo.

-ALGO IMPORTANTE: Premades y Balanceo de Mecánicas del Juego. Jugar hoy día como ASESINO es saber que vas a PERDER EL 80% LARGO DE PARTIDAS sin poder hacer nada para cambiarlo. En el momento que subes levemente de Rango y hay un mínimo Teamplay entre los Supervivientes estas perdido y si juegas contra PREMADES hacen lo que les sale de los cojones, ellos te acosan a ti en vez de tú a ellos... O solucionan ya esto o la gente no jugara como Asesino y el juego se extinguirá. (Y con razón)

Por otra parte, juego está muy bien y da para echarle muchas horas, pero hay cosas que arruinan la experiencia de juego brutalmente y deben solucionarse para que este juego sea recomendable de comprar:

- Balanceo y Smurfers: El sistema de Balanceo de partidas es sencillamente inexistente/ineficaz casi por completo. En baremo aproximadamente 3/10 de partidas jugadas han sido justas, el resto desbalanceadas y muchas de las mismas de vergüenza ajena.

- Campeo y Tuneleo: Consecuencia directa del Balance nefasto del juego, los Killers campean a los Supervivientes porque no les queda otra opción si esperan tener una partida justa. Esto esta derivando a su vez en una Comunidad más tóxica por cada dia que pasa

Hasta que esto no se solucione no recomiendaria la compra de este juego y muchisimo menos si no esta de oferta.

Dead By Dailight est un très bon jeu ,il y a beaucoup de choix dans les personnages ce qui rends la façon de jouer intéréssante. Il y a malheureusement encore certaines choses à améliorer comme le bodyblock qui est trop présent ,parfois le tueur nous touches alors qu'il ne devrait pas. Certains tueurs comme Le Docteur ou encore Le Cannibale sont beaucoup trop puissant il est très difficile de s'échapper. Beaucoup de gens triches en campant ou en bloquant les joueurs ,il y a beaucoup de rageux la plupart du temps ,c'est assez rare de tomber sur des personnes sympathiques. Ce jeu a un bon avenir à mon avis car il est très bon ,un peu de diversitée serait la bienvenue et certaines choses à corriger. Je recommande ce jeu.

Saw it on stream, thought it looked pretty cool. Having a blast with it so far, with very few complaints. The game has very simple controls that are easy to pick up, but there are also plenty of builds with higher skill ceilings for some try-harding. The leveling feels really good, very addictive early on for sure. Overall the community seems to be a split of pure toxicity and overwhelming kindness. I'm not even joking, the post-game chat is never in-between; you're either getting cussed out or told to have a wonderful day.

There need a kind of practice mode or some try out killer/survivors. I also heard some alleged speedhackers roaming around, making game unfun. I also heard Matchmaking is just... weird. If you are new survivor, you will be straight up placed on a match who could be a good killer. It's feeling 50/50.

I wish there is a Neutral for this. Would recommend but not at the same time.

I love this game so much that I acually bought this for PS4 first and now got it for PC. It's an amazing game with the terror experience and acual fear in a multiplayer game. Yes their's toxicity in the community and ALOT of things ruin the game (Trolling survivors, survivors that farm you and leave you to die and camping Killers.) but if you can manage to get around these things and keep on playing, higher ranks become SO much fun and some games can be incredibly tense. Just ignore what everyone says negativly about the game and give it a try. Believe me, you'll love it!! Don't miss this excellent experiance!

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME
If youre considering buying this hunk of shit, just dont

Trust the guy with 1500 wasted hours on this game.
Itll suck your wallet dry, your time and most of all, your happiness.
If you have anything beyond the calmness and zen of master fucking Oogway then enjoy buying a new keyboard after you get relentlessly camped/tunneled/tbagged/clickyclicked/blinded/DS'd/stunned out of a kill.
Survivors tbag and click and talk shit and killers tunnel and camp while your teammates sit in a corner and inspect a bush for 20 minutes and then complain when they lose.

I think genuinely saddest of all is that the devs just DO NOT at all give a crap if this game functions properly, as long as the can sell their DLC updates. They couldnt give less of a shit about fixing the ACTUAL GAME and the systemic problems that have plagued the game since RELEASE. Every new patch is bugged and broken and new perks are broken to which it takes them months to balance it, just for it to still be broken.

I shit you not, the ONLY way to have fun in this game anymore is to bully some poor noob killer who installed the game 5 minutes ago or to ebony mori a team of tbag SWF.

Sadly, when the only way you can have fun in the game is by bullying other people into the dirt, do you think a positive community stands behind this game? yeah fucking right. yeah the community is exactly what you would expect, theres not even anything else worth saying about it.


In conclusion, dont buy this, PLEASE DONT BUY THIS

Probably the most toxoic community you can find. It's not the gameplay that makes people toxic, they just dont like to get hunted or outplayed. 

But if you like to chase people around and make them rage and whine in chat, this game is perfect for you. It's fun and intuitive, making survivors run in a third-person aspect while making the killer run in first person. the survivors are generally slower at running but given the third person view they have an easier time juking the killer. the killer has good speed and incredible powers, but being in first person, you cant always see where your prey is going.

Trash game. Incompetent, greedy developers. 

There is zero balance whatsoever, the game is riddled with bugs that are ongoing since launch, around 4 years ago. Every update breaks the game more and tilts the balance either to the Killer side, or the Survivor side. There is no in-between. The community is probably the most toxic I've ever encountered. It surpasses the toxicity of LoL by far.

Their forum moderators both on BHVR and Steam silence everyone right away with permanent bans just because they state their negative opinions about the game or point out the flaws. BHVR tickets remain unanswered forever (I have been waiting for a reply for almost 2 months now - EDIT: THE TICKET WAS NEVER ANSWERED!).

EDIT: As of 09/02/2021 the latest update completely BROKE the game. Hence the dive from 85+% down to 62% and dropping.

Ok Ive been playing for 130 hours now and i have seen the core of the fun. It are fast multiplayer matches in which you can be a survivor (party of 4) or a killer. Gear doesnt count that much, a good player with no gear can beat a fully perked bad player.

Highly recommended!

Honestly, I get really scared of horror games but let me tell you, THIS GAME IS ADDICTING to play. I played for two whole weeks and it's really fun. There are some bugs and glitches but not a whole lot. The only downfall is the players rather than the game, the game is prewtty good but the community is kind of toxic, by toxic, I meant, facecampers/normal campers. The physics in the game are super well done.

Es ist ein super Game wenn man es mit Freunden spielt. Es ist nur ziemlich nervig wenn man Teammates bekommt die einen einfach am Harken hängen lassen oder einen blocken sodass der Killer einen schlagen kann. Trotzdem ist es ein klasse Spiel :)

[h1]Bevor du mir eine Anfrage schickst:[/h1]
✔️⠀Schreib mir ein Kommentar warum du mich adden möchtest oder woher du mich kennst.
✔️⠀Kenne den Inhalt meines Profils, damit du weißt worauf du dich einlässt.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
✖️⠀Erwarte nicht dass ich jeden Tag schreiben möchte, bin manchmal sehr Introvertiert.
✖️⠀Schicke mir keine Spieleeinladungen ohne drüber geredet zu haben.
✖️⠀Sei keine depressive Dramaqueen mit Kurzschlussreaktionen oder bockigkeit.
✖️⠀Stell mir keine Anfrage wenn wir schonmal Freunde waren... ich bin kein Jojo...

I had a lot of fun in this game. The only thing that irritates me is that, you invest a whole lot of time in a playthrough then when you finally repaired 5 machines and run from the exit, the game disconnects from the server (probably the host/killer's doing). Which pretty much ruins the game and ending up wasting a lot of time for it. Especially if this happens consecutively.

Edit: The latest update made the ranking system much tolerable. So I am giving it now a thumbs up. Git gud

Un pò sbilanciato soprattutto per quanto riguarda alcuni perk dei killer e le abiilità stesse dei killer che come quella dell'infermiera sono troppo forti soprattutto se abbinata con i giusti perk appunto. Inoltre il framerate è abbastanza basso in certe circostanze. Per il resto il gioco è divertente sopratutto se giocato con gli amici. Ve lo consiglio ma non lo reputo competitivo perchè dipende quasi tutto dalle persone che ti trovi in squandra se sei survivor.
